title: Nourished by Time Announces Tour of North America and Europe
description: Marcus Brown will support his new album, The Passionate Ones, with newly announced shows in the summer and autumn
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Marcus Brown will support his new album, The Passionate Ones, with newly announced shows in the summer and autumn
text: Marcus Brown has announced a tour that begins after he releases his new Nourished by Time album. The tour officially kicks off in Brown’s Baltimore hometown on Thursday, September 11. He’ll continue with more North American shows throughout September and October. The European and UK leg of the tour takes place in November. Openers on the tour include Zsela, Tony Bontana, Laura Groves, and Joviale. See Nourished by Time’s tour dates below.Brown will release his new album, The Passionate Ones, on August 22. It’s his first full-length release for XL Recordings.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Marcus Brown has announced a tour that begins after he releases his new Nourished by Time album. The tour officially kicks off in Brown’s Baltimore hometown on Thursday, September 11. He’ll continue with more North American shows throughout September and October. The European and UK leg of the tour takes place in November. Openers on the tour include Zsela, Tony Bontana, Laura Groves, and Joviale. See Nourished by Time’s tour dates below.

Brown will release his new album, The Passionate Ones, on August 22. It’s his first full-length release for XL Recordings.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Nourished by Time: The Passionate Ones Tour
